sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect,useState } from 'react'; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom" import axios from 'axios'; import { useParams, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { selectedStock,removeselectedStock } from '../../Redux/actions/stockActions'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import "../../../assets/styles/custom/Stock.css" const StockDetails = () => { const history = useHistory() const { StockId } = useParams(); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const stock = useSelector((state) => state.stock) const [currentitem,setcurrentitem] = useState({ id : 0, stokkod :'', stokadı :'', miktar :0, birim :'', alışfiyat :0.0, satışfiyat :0.0, kdv :'', İskonto :'' }) const axiosStockDetail = async () => { console.log('axiosa girdim') const response = await axios.get('http://localhost:18598/api/Stok/GetSelectedStock?ID=' + StockId, {headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${localStorage.getItem('token')}` }}) .catch(error => { if (error.response.status == '401') { history.push("/Login") } }) if (response != undefined){ dispatch(selectedStock(response.data)); } }; useEffect(() => { if (StockId && StockId !== "") axiosStockDetail(); return dispatch(removeselectedStock()); }, [StockId]); useEffect(() => { if (stock !=undefined) setcurrentitem(stock) }, [stock]); console.log('currentitem:' , currentitem) console.log('stock: ', stock); return (
Stock Update
stock.stokadı = e.target.value} value={stock.stokadı} >
this.Kullanıcıadi = e.target.value} />
this.Soyisim = e.target.value} />
this.Mailadres = e.target.value} />
this.Şifre = e.target.value} />
Already have an account? Login
) } export default StockDetails;
